Description: 
 Pikachu can generate powerful electricity and have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

Description:
 It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

Description: 
 When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

Description:
 There is a plant seed on its gback right from the day this Pokemon is born. The seed slowly grows larger..

Description: 
 when viwed through a microcope, this Pokemon's short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.

Description: 
 Its DNA is almost the same as Mew's. However, its size and disposition are vastly different..
